mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(name, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, articles_total) VALUES (#{name}, now(), now(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: select id, name, create_time, update_time, articles_total from category where is_deleted = 0 order by articles_total desc
select id, name, create_time, update_time, articles_total from category where name = #{name} and is_deleted = 0
select id, name, create_time, update_time, articles_total from category where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
